titleStmt.title: The primitive origination of mankind, considered and examined according to the light of nature written by the Honourable Sir Matthew Hale, Knight ...
titleStmt.author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Godbid for William Shrowsbery ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
A signature is incomplete, the port. is lacking, and pages 133-134 are missing in the filmed copy. Beginning-p. 25 and 122-147 photographed from Newberry Library copy and inserted at the end.
